title: AI enabled fast charging of lithium-ion batteries of electric vehicles during their life cycle: review, challenges and perspectives
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03063J, Review Article
Daoming Sun, Dongxu Guo, Yufang Lu, Jiali Chen, Yao Lu, Xuebing Han, Xuning Feng, Languang Lu, Hewu Wang, Minggao Ouyang
This review presents a thorough investigation of factors affecting fast charging, battery modeling, key state estimation and fast charging control strategies and provides a forward-looking perspective on AI enabled fast charging technology of LIBs.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
